page.title: 10COMMUNICATIONS
page.content: From the amount of traffic travelling to and from the Lochans; it appears that there were many more going to{ {STRANRAER}than going to the Lochans. The reason for this could be that many housewives were going to Stranraer to do there weekly shopping. The majority were local with only one car being a tourist on the second census. However, on the first census there were a notable number of tourists going in the direction of{PORTPATRICK. There seems to be very few cars owned in the Lochans than expected. This can be accounted for, as within an hour 5 taxis passed going to the Lochans and then taking their passengers on to Stranraer.
